Parameters:

setAutoReloadData

public void setAutoReloadData(java.lang.String elexpression)
When set to true the defaul, the grid reload the the data after a server request. When false the method reloadData must be called to force the data be refreshed

Parameters:
elexpression - a ValueExpression return a boolean value
